abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 59 INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN JOSEPH RODDY An Ordinance recommended by the Planning Commission on May 6, 2015, to change the zoning of property as indicated on the District Map, from "J" Industrial District to the "H" Area Commercial District, in City Block 2181.06 (3632, 3634, 3636, 3640, 3642, 3646, 3650, 3652, 3654, 3656, 3660, 3662, 3666, 3668, 3670, 3672, 3676 & 3678 Hickory Street and 3633, 3635, 3639, 3641, 3645, 3647, 3651, 3653, 3657, 3659, 3663, 3665, 3669, 3671, 3673, 3677 & 3681 Rutger Street), so as to include the described parcels of land in City Block 2181.06; and containing an emergency clause.
